choices: Say no at the risk of being stomped
1.content: It was a normal night with you and your hawkmon as you were watching tv with him, you look at the clock and notice its 10:00 PM. "Oh!" you shout "its really late hawkmon! we shoud go to bed!" "Aww but i wanna stay up some more! im not tired" whined hawkmon "sorry hawkmon but its really late" you said "pleeeaaase?? just 5 more minutes??" he begged "sorry buddy...but its bed time" you replied "HMPH!" hawkmon pouted. "now lets go to bed" you said "fine...." he said saddened, you then walk into your room while hawkmon is just getting off the couch "I wish i was the big guy around here" he murmered to himself "then he would have to listen to me! and if he didnt listen i could just squash him, hehe" he thought to himself. then as you lay down you start to feel dizzy, with the world spinning around you then finally you pass out. Then as you wake up you noice a big pair of eyes staring directly at you "WHAAA!" you jump "hhehehe my wish came true! im the big guy now!" said a booming voice "whaa what? h-h-hhawkmon?" you ask "yup! thats me! large and in charge and about to stomp you if you dont obey me! hehhee" he says with a smirk on his face "stomp...me? ha! im bigger than you" you reply with a cocky attitude "Umm...notice anything different? like for instance..YOUR SIZE?" he says laughing "my size?.... AHHHHH!!" you scream getting a good look at him "yeah i know!! you must be the size of an ant! hahhaa!" he laughs. "Cmon now hawkmon arent we friends? hehehe... lets not get too violent here buddy hehe...." you say scared" "Me?! hurt you? my best friend? never!" he said "phew" you say relieved "so thats why i"ll just make you my servant!" he said "wait...what?!!" you yell "yup i bet you'll be the best slave ever!" his voice boomed at you. "Now lets start....what should you do for me now? hmmmm ahh i know!" he sits down with his big yellow feet infront of you "you can rub my feet! or scrub my talons!" he says excited "uuuh....wait! hawkmon please dont make me do this!" you plead "sorry Tyler but im in charge now!" he replies. You then....
1.title: Get to work

choices: "I'm gonna tie you to my smelly sole!"
11.content: You fear being stomped by him so you decide to listen to him, you then start smoothly sliding your hands across his wrinkly yellow feet with an unbearable smell "heeh! that feels good hhaahaa" hawkmon says relaxed. Then you start messaging the toes, getting your fingers in between them. You then start rubbing the claw sheaths, hours pass after finally finishing the right foot as you move to the left one rubbing his sweaty sole "hang on a second Tyler!" hawkmon says "I've got other plans for you!" he said with an evil smirk "what now?" you say nervous.
11.title: rub his feet

111.content:
"You are now gonna lick my feet!" Hawkmon said.

"What? Hawkmon why are you doing this to me? I just tell you what to do because I want the best for you!" Tyler exclaimed.

"Well guess what, you are going to listen to ME now! Or else..." Hawkmon said as he raised his rough clawed foot on top of Tyler reminding him about the stomp warning.

"NO WAIT I'LL DO IT, I'LL DO IT!". Tyler shouted.

Tyler approached Hawkmon's smooth yellow feet carefully, not wanting to anger his "friend" by any reason. He hesitated for a while, until he finally stuck his tongue out of his mouth to drag it up and down his digimon's nasty feet.

"That's it Tyler, I want you to get every drop of sweat from my feet. I wanna see my face in them!" Hawkmon ordered.

Tyler slid his tongue along Hawkmon's soles with all his strength, getting every inch of sweat and dirt from them while Hawkmon enjoyed his new position in his house. Every now and then, he wiggled his toes and moved his feet from side to side, making it harder for Tyler to clean his sore feet. By that evil smirk in his face, he could tell that Hawkmon was enjoying every second of Tyler's humiliation in front of his giant digimon feet. After a good half an hour, Hawkmon told Tyler to stop, making him fall down completely exhausted due to this long worshipping session...

"You've been a very good servant, but I'm not done yet..." Hawkmon said.

"You will now...
111.title: "Lick my feet!"

choices: You suggest that you should both go to bed.
13.content:
"No."

"...what?" Hawkmon blinks, surprised you were refusing to listen to him despite the clear size advantage he now has over you.

"I said no. I'm a human being, not your pet or slave," you say, clenching your fists tight. "Go ahead and 'punish' me as you see fit, but I'm not going to do what you tell me to."

Fury rose up in Hawkmon. He'd spent his entire time here doing what you told him to do. Now, he finally has control over you, and you aren't even going to listen to him! It's just ridiculous! "...aw, you're no fun," Hawkmon frowns, drooping down in sadness. "I'd never intentionally hurt you...I just wanted to be the bigger bird for once. You're always telling me what to do, and I just wanted to see what it feels like..."

You can't help but feel sorry for the bird, so you give his talon a light hug. "I only tell you what to do because I'm looking out for you. Staying up late will make you sleep in, and you'll be tired tomorrow."

Hawkmon thinks for a moment, then smiles weakly. "I...guess that makes sense. So...now what?"
13.title: Say no at the risk of being stomped

131.content:
You look at your gigantic digimon, looking down with a slight bit of disappointment in his face, he never was going to hurt you, he just wanted to be the boss for a day. You sigh "uhhh Hawkmon..." you say gently tapping his big yellow sole to get his attention. "You're gonna punish ME now?" he replied with a sad voice.

You turn your attention to his big talons with a little smirk, "please...have mercy oh great Hawkmon, command and I shall obey". You kneel before his soles, looking up at his eyes which changed from sad to curious. "Tyler, what are you...?" he is interrupted as you then start to message the rough-skinned feet by pressing your hands against them as hard as you can.

You wink at your "master" as you rub the digimon's feet. "Ohhh I get it.....ok then, *ahem* puny human, as your ruler, I demand that you message my sore feet!" Hawkmon says making his voice deeper with an obviously fake look of impatience. "Yes my lord, I will do my duty as a worthless human slave!" You say trying your best to sooth the aches on the digimon's soles. Then....
131.title: You rub Hawkmon's talons anyways.

info.brief_description: Your trustworthy hawkmon turns againt you when you wake up the size of an ant!
info.description: Your name is Tyler, and your best friend is a hawkmon who has been loyal to you as a digimon for years. You were always nice to him, feeding him, grooming him, and he was always nice to you in return. You two thought that this friendship would never end.....until one night......
